Wait, what?! You've killed the boss?! This must be a bug... Jokes asside, you've reached the end of this demo level. Congratulations! (More content comming soon)

You can interact with signboards to read the text by moving close to them and pressing the E key or the controller button Y. Also press the E key or the controller button Y to close the message boxes or make the text appear faster.
It's dangerous to go alone! Take this.
